desc: Residential moving company in Brooklyn NY 11221. Local moving company | The Golden Truck Moving Company

layout.text: Fast and Effective Moving Service in NYC and Sorrounding Boroughs

We offer a high quality residential and commercial moving services. we understand you want to get things done fast and well. Our team of movers are trained to work fast, efficiently and respectfully. The Golden Truck is a fully licensed and insured moving company. Since each moving needs are unique we offer the following options. movers only, movers and truck, disassable and reassemble, packing and reorganizing, cleaning and garbage removal. we offer our services in 2 different ways: By the hour or flat rate services.
THE GOLDEN TRUCK MOVING COMPANY IS A PROFESSIONAL MOVING COMPANY SERVICING NY/NJ OUR TEAM OF HIGHLY TRAINED MOVERS ARE READY TO SERVE YOU ON YOUR NEXT MOVING PROJECT.
